software.singularity: Used to run the Mega Docker container
software.python27: Used for the Mega Docker script
software.xvfb-run: Used to run the Mega Docker script with a virtual display
software.ldax_setup: Provides bash and Matlab configuration for the Mega Docker script
software.masimatlab: Contains XNAT spiders for the Mega Docker script
software.fsl5: Used for FSL commands in the Mega Docker script
software.camino: Used for Camino commands in the Mega Docker script
software.freesurfer: Used for FreeSurfer commands in the Mega Docker script

other.xnat_user: The username for the XNAT server
other.session_limit: The maximum number of open sessions allowed on the XNAT server
other.sleep_maximum: The maximum amount of time to sleep if the session limit is exceeded
other.sleep_short: The shorter amount of time to sleep when initially checking for sessions

job_specific_variables.job_email: Email address to receive job notifications
job_specific_variables.job_cmds: Commands to be executed by the job
